title: @Riot thank you for Dunkmaster Darius.
body: Holy shit is this skin badass and fun in lane.

replies.body: Observe the wild Baconhawk in its newfound home, The Boards where it makes its presence known to everyone, and where everyone welcomes the wise words it brings.
Killing Teemo just got way more fun.

Femgar should be a skin.

FEMGAR

would be amazing
{{summoner:11}} and {{summoner:14}}

Thank you for Dunkmaster Darius! 

I have loaded my stream I did to Youtube, with Dunkmaster Darius

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AGnjvFEm8rc

Dyrus be jealous{{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:119}}
If only someone would gift me Darius and His dunkmaster skin <3 RIP Money
